entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [8.0] [OSX] Long Running Test: System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.RSAKeyFileTests.ReadEncryptedRsa16384 #95094
  • Move more of the Android Crypto PAL layer into Java #95093
    Future
  • [mono][wasm] Add interpreter support for calls to UnmanagedCallersOnly EntryPoint without managed delegate reference #95087
    9.0.0
  • Enable workload to consume wasi-sdk packages #95086
  • [mono][wasm] wasm interop tracking #95084
    9.0.0
  • Passing generic class with nullable reference type in JsonSerializableAttribute raises CS8620 when used #95083
    Future
  • Checked/Release asm diffs failure: Assertion failed 'compiler->compIsaSupportedDebugOnly(HWIntrinsicInfo::lookupIsa(intrin.id))' #95081
    9.0.0
  • JsonSerializer IgnoreReadOnlyProperties Not Working for Enumerable Properties #95080
  • Console.IsInputRedirected returns true on git bash when there is no redirected input #95079
  • Assertion failed 'OperIs(GT_LCL_VAR, GT_LCL_FLD, GT_PHI_ARG, GT_STORE_LCL_VAR, GT_STORE_LCL_FLD, GT_LCL_ADDR)' #95078
    9.0.0
  • Update System.Linq.Expressions ref code for #94069 #95077
  • why we need dotnet.wasm? #95076
  • .NET 8 `QuicConnection` AuthenticationException: RemoteCertificateNameMismatch #95072
  • Linux: Segfault in strlen running helloworld.cs #95070
  • iOS runtime tests should use just-run xharness command instead of run #95060
    9.0.0
  • TrimmerRootDescriptor is not able to preserve generic instantiations #95058
  • Logging Source Generator fails to compile using keyword parameters with @ prefixes depending on the placeholder order #95057
    Future
  • JIT: Missing zero initialization of stackallocs converted to locals for "init mem" mismatches during inlining #95056
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Memory.Span #95073
  • The input string 'System.ReadOnlySpan<Byte>[2]' was not in a correct format. #95044
    Future
  • Behavior changes with optimizations on x86 #95043

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add overload of `Type.GetMethod` that takes a name, generic parameter count, binding flags and parameter types #90995
    9.0.0
  • GetMonthName for HijriCalendar #50548
    Future
  • NET5.0 vs NETCore3.1 - Strings comparison between space and non-breaking-space characters #53856
    Future
  • Incorrect ordering of Slovak words in F# and C# #58362
    Future
  • Can't import Component Model functions in WASI apps #94513
    9.0.0
  • How to cancel StreamReader.ReadLineAsync with a CancellationToken or set timeout to stop reading? #42976
    Future
  • create WASM module import from any `[DLLImport]` which doesn't match known static native symbols #86984
    9.0.0
  • `CultureInfo` constructor fails with string "x-TEST" #60737
    Future
  • maybe create WASM module export from `[UnmanagedCallersOnly]` #86985
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'genCountBits(availableSet) == 1' #95025
    9.0.0
  • JIT: EH successors do not account for handler -> handler flow in the presence of filters #94974
    9.0.0
  • crossgen2 fails on FIPS enabled systems (due to MD5 hashing) #94786
  • NativeAOT app crashes when run on a machine with an ETW session with GCHeapDump and Type keywords enabled #88491
    9.0.0
  • Asserts from ILLink analyzers #94260
  • Asserts in ILLink analyzer #94858
  • FailFast from JIT_GetGenericsGCStaticBase (from R2R publish build) #95064
  • `Math.Sin` difference between FW and 8 #95059
  • JIT: SSA does not add proper phi args for second pass EH successors #94954
    9.0.0
  • Make it easy to determine entry assembly path when debugging CoreCLR #94474
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Revert "Update to the latest dotnet/command-line-api version"" #95092
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Permit MD5 regardless of FIPS configuration for Linux #95090
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0-staging] Permit MD5 regardless of FIPS configuration for Linux #95089
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • Make build VMR cross build compatible #95088
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Add a "DFS blocks" phase #95085
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #95082
    area-codeflow
  • Add a optional AOT mode on wasm which doesn't depend on c++ unwinding so … #95074
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Introduce CallConvSwift and special register types to represent the Swift ABI calling convention #95065
    api-suggestion, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Fix printing Helix workitems count for Android #95061
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Ensure ExceptionStringIds are handled #95053
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasi] Initial wasi/aot build support #95051
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Type.GetMethod(name, genericParameterCount, bindingAttr, types) overload #94889
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Implement initial support for WasmImportLinkage in the AppBuilders #94615
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Set frozen cache emscripten variable conditionally #95015
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [JIT] Optimize constant V512 vector with broadcast #92017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not mark st1 StoreSelectedScalar variant as needing consecutive registers #95052
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Keep fgBBcount up to date #95034
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Model that handler flow can bypass filters #95062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add eng/pipelines/common/variables.yml to coreclr pipelines #95063
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add SVE InstructionSet for Arm64 #95021
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix managed ContentionStart data #95035
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Revert "[release/8.0] Downgrade 6 & 7 per tactics" #95075
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.1
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use live M.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces dependency #94459
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.1
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][interp] Fix incorrect stack type information #94966
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.1
  • [release/8.0-staging] Permit MD5 regardless of FIPS configuration for Linux #94979
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.1
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Vector512.CopyTo #95026
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, 8.0.1
  • [release/6.0-staging] Store entry assembly path for easy access for diagnostics #95049
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.26
  • [release/7.0-staging] Store entry assembly path for easy access for diagnostics #95047
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider, area-Host, 7.0.16
  • [release/8.0-staging] Store entry assembly path for easy access for diagnostics #95045
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 8.0.1
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix for a stress crash in ComAwareWeakReferenceNative::HasInteropInfo #94649
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.1
  • Initial gcdump support #94673
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [ILLink analyzer] Improve handling of invalid operations #94888
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Revert "Replace LowLevelLock with Lock" #95071
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert S.R.InteropServices.Marshal COM-related FCalls to QCalls #95038
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Clean up NYI_RISCV64 in CodeGen and Emitter #94666
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Replace LowLevelLock with Lock #94991
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Dump BB in/out memory SSAs inline when SSA is valid #95017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Grammar update for Chunk<TSource>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source, int size) returns xmldoc #95010
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Update HttpClientBuilderExtensions.cs #94869
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 9.0.0
  • Split commands in FtpWebRequest #95009
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Implement eval (ICorDebugEval related). #95020
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Process all EH successors for "in-block" defs in SSA #94955
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Store entry assembly path for easy access for diagnostics #95027
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr

Updated

  • Extending testing domain for VARIANT #95095
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • Memory mapped stresslog for NativeAOT #92506
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (Noble Numbat) Runtime Identifiers to .NET 6.0 #94913
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] Fix Lock's usage of NativeRuntimeEventSource.Log to account for recursive accesses during its own class construction #94873
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Flush-to-zero behavior for float-to-int conversion #94762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Add DynamicHelpers to riscv64 stubs #94735
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix LSRA handling of arm32 double registers and spilling #94947
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Predicate register placeholder methods and Z registers #95016
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change to use std int for Interop tests #95040
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] Improve debugger features #94066
    area-Debugger-mono
  • We already have cross-compilers etc for musl and win-arm64. Actually use them #94876
    area-Build-mono
  • [perf] Run localized Blazor scenario #95023
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, perf-pipeline
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix JsonArray.Add and ReplaceWith regressions. #94882
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.1
  • [release/8.0-staging] Do not generate broken debug info for non-methods #94757
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.1
  • Do not Path.Join user directory if it's "C:" #94587
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Add empty SVE API for Arm64 #94791
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Fix ILLink/ILC hang when tracking too many hoisted local values #95041
    area-Tools-ILLink, needs-area-label
  • JIT ARM64/SVE2: Add increment/decrement from predicate register instructions #94811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • `JsonSerializerOptions.Web` for `JsonSerializerOptions` #94370
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Combine rootDir with relative file names #94528
    NO-MERGE, breaking-change, area-Extensions-FileSystem, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Add EventSource event for WaitHandle waits #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Unify parsing part of BigInteger with CoreLib #85978
    area-System.Numerics, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64, when the file offset is >4GB #94970
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Improve ConcurrentDictionary xml docs #94993
    documentation, area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] Implement NativeWalker. #94853
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging debugger tests #94965
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET multi-targeting / SingeProject libraries always incur build even when no changes #37090
  • Microsoft.WindowsDesktop.App.Runtime pack should respect WinForms-Wpf profiles #37088
  • I can't build dotnet 7 #37087

Closed

  • MulticoreJit Optimization Data Location should be configurable #6242
    Backlog
  • Set metadata on references coming from shared framework targeting pack to show them in solution explorer tree view #2802
  • The Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Analyzers package has no stable version #37082
  • x64 installer gives poor error message on x86 #7010
    Backlog
  • dotnet version <FULLVERSION> #6704
    Backlog
  • dotnet restore failes if runtime contains "centos.7.1-x64" #6584
    Backlog
  • An item with the same key has already been added. Key: K2Innovators.BizMovAutomation.Core #6733
    Backlog
  • Problems with publish on TeamCity after upgrade from RC2 to RTM #6748
    Backlog
  • Can't build from VS15 command prompt #6841
    Backlog
  • Create a Nuget package for the full SDK #300
    Backlog
  • Add more windows installer tests #5923
    Backlog
  • Improve gaurdrails for the CLI #4738
    Backlog
  • Duplicate output files for net452 #6013
    Backlog
  • Add the capability for dotnet-publish to generate a folder structure corresponding to what nuget restore does + corresponding .deps file #4872
    Backlog
  • How to disable assemblies referenced by project or nuget package? #10252
  • "Dotnet New Console" does not handle paths with "%" character #10253
  • Move Version calculation to targets #3173
  • Don't reuse the https://aka.ms/sdkimplicitrefs link to indicate version should not be indicated #2879
    Backlog
  • dotnet build ignores -f option in some cases #10060
  • Incorrect assembly binding redirects generated in 3.0 preview #2795
  • Editor and Compiler doesn't handle preprocessor symbols for target frameworks with Visual Basic .Net Core/.Net Standard #2671
  • Add more logging to msbuild sdk resolver #9655
  • Publish project to Ubuntu - File required after publication #9495
  • Reference items might contain dupes after running ConflictResolution when targeting 4.7.2 #2279
  • Listing packages using a relative path solution file fails with the .NET 8 SDK when it succeeded in .NET 7 #37048
  • dotnet not recognised as cmdlet, function... #37037

PullRequests

Created

  • Parse -d command differently based on position #37091
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Containers support was moved higher to enable creating image of CLI apps #37072
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK

Merged

  • Fix typo in InstantiateCommand.TabCompletion.cs #37068
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Parse -d command differently based on position #35492
    Servicing-consider, Area-CLI
  • Use .NET 9.0 versions for task dependencies #37013
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to the RTM release build #36870
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2320166 #36923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Lock statement pattern #7104

  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: BinaryCompatOnlyAttribute #7706

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Revisit params logic in OverloadResolution #70923
  • Nuget for Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset 4.8.0 #70919
  • [Bug]: No IntelliSense pop-ups within interpolation expressions #70918

Closed

  • [Bug]: Renaming `record` property symbol from `record` definition does not apply refactor to property pattern expressions #70917
  • Multi-line comment formatting issue #8275
    Backlog
  • Unhelpful error from event hookup #7565
    Backlog
  • Call Hierarchy not navigating/searching some symbols #7528
    Backlog
  • Passed by reference before it has been assigned a value #48160
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio Editor Classifier partly broken because ISignature is casted to Signature #7332
    Backlog
  • Add performance test for FixAllProvider #7636
    Backlog
  • Allow Project to expose information on Resources #7772
    Backlog
  • InvalidCastException while reducing explicit name #7920
    Backlog
  • Infrastructure: Make workspaces and features layers tests portable to CoreCLR #7040
    Backlog
  • Lightbulb Diff Preview doesn't ensure alignment of diff segments #5333
    Backlog
  • Update snippets to use modern language features (eg "nameof") #5574
    Backlog
  • Rich text/ASCII art/images in IntelliSense XML comments #1607
    Backlog
  • Make RemoveUnnecessaryImportsService a public API #1576
    Backlog
  • Intellisense failure for await in non-async method (regression from VS2013) #1884
    Backlog
  • Compiler failure introduced with Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp v4.4.0 #70894
  • Impossible to implement Source Generators for projects targeting .NET 8 #70922
  • Execute roslynator analyze in a python script doesn't work in some case #70915

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2317474 #70928
  • Enable route embedded language features in vscode #70927
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make sure document is frozen in semantic snippet provider #70926
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix override completion with nint/nuint parameters #70925
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Return correct kind for PE lambdas #70920
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement null conditional await #70916
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Pass project info to the Razor extension in VS Code #70913
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add GetSemanticModel method with disableNullableAnalysis flag #70912
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Simplify logic around `params` parameters in `OverloadResolution.AnalyzeArguments` #70911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Use more specific return type for `Binder.ConvertCollectionExpression` method. #70921
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Add note about deeply nested expressions #70924
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Ship Devkit dependencies as a nuget package to support directly including in the C# extension #70875
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Convert our checksum type into a struct #70873
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move our OOP syncing code off of source-text checksums, onto content hashes. #70893
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Automatically detect missing NuGet packages and restore #70851
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update to the latest dotnet/command-line-api version #70817
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Allow analyzer exceptions to fall through if desired #70729
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove extra logic to see if users are squatting on keywords #59086
    Area-IDE
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid cycle in tuple explicit interface implementation #70694
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot Reload not working: Cannot update because an inferred delegate type has changed. #52270
  • New route analysers don't appear to support regex #52268
  • blazor.web.js missing from publish output #52266
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot #52264
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #52263
  • Perf regression: https, json #52262
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #52261
  • [.net 8][Blazor] <Navigating> tag is not working (or improve documentation) #52257
  • Blazor hosted webassembly NavigationManager NavigateTo causing client navigation instead of silent history.pushState #52256
  • Identity: Blazor: Setting Cookie.SameSite = SameSiteMode.Strict cause unexpected AuthorizationView behavior for external logins #52253
  • .Net 8 SDK - AddRazorRuntimeCompilation error - Index.cshtml not found #52248
  • dotnet new webapi template : package reference Swashbuckle.AspNetCore version isn't the last one #52246
  • .NET 8 Upgrade Causes Post-Logout Loop in Blazor Server App with Azure AD B2C #52245
  • net5 project can not run in iisexpress for visualstudio 17.8.0 #52254
  • Dynamic ports via code in runtime. #52244
  • Quarantine Http2RequestTests.GET_RequestReturnsLargeData_GracefulShutdownDuringRequest_RequestGracefullyCompletes #52238
    Test failures
  • dotnet user-secrets list --json outputs invalid json #52247

Closed

  • the ASPNetCore original API template project is missing the 'Store user accounts in-app' Authentication #11216
    Backlog
  • NET 8 Blazor Cookie Authentication and Authorization Policy not the same as in NET 7 #52222
  • Scaffolding command in official documentation is broken (on Linux, at least) #26524
    Backlog
  • Allow the parameterization of the DefaultIdentityUIPathPrefix value when using AddIdentityServerJwt() #21221
    Backlog
  • Allow configuration of 2FA Tokens clock skew (default 90s) #13347
    Backlog
  • [Feature Request] UserManager inconsistencies in confirming tokens #12672
    Backlog
  • A suggestion to optimize the code of Identity scaffolding based on FxCopAnalyzers #9452
    Backlog
  • Unsafe Two Factor Recovery Codes #5815
    Backlog
  • RFC6238 AuthenticatorService #5811
    Backlog
  • Improve SignalR Backplane for small number of servers #48624
  • Provide updated Blazor Server template for .NET 8 #52227
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #52197
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #52201
  • Net8.0 Router NotFound isn't called when an invalid page is entered in the addressbar #52251
  • SecurityTokenMalformedException after updating to .NET 8 #52191
  • System.InvalidOperationException: Error: No element is currently associated with component 0 #51393
    8.0.x
  • Schema URL in templated launchSettings.json should use HTTPS #51168
  • Quarantine Interop.FunctionalTests.HttpClientHttp2InteropTests.Settings_MaxFrameSize_Larger_Server #41363
    Test failures
  • MultiplexEcho test failure #38087
    Test failures
  • HttpClientHttp2InteropTests.Echo test failure #37943
    Test failures
  • Quarantine PersistentState_StreamsReused_StatePersisted #38998
    Test failures
  • Quarantine ClientCertificate_NoOrDelayed_Available_Ignored #41131
    Test failures
  • Quarantine Interop.FunctionalTests.Http3.Http3RequestTests.GET_ConnectionsMakingMultipleRequests_AllSuccess #43374
    Test failures
  • Unskip MsQuic-dependent Tests on Debian12 When Available #46616
    Test failures
  • Hot Reload with dotnet-watch and Blazor WebAssembly fails on simple markup .razor changes with "No hot reload changes to apply." in .NET 7 and "not supported by the runtime" in .NET 8 RC2. #51781
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot #52243
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #52225
  • Publish using Web Deploy has locking issues since .NET 8 #52149
  • Prueba #52241
  • Theme: Cloud Native #47240
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete Stale Chunks #52272
    area-auth
  • Fix #51636 (NavigateTo without enhanced nav) #52267
    area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [Blazor] Update MSBuild targets so they get imported correctly. #52260
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • Stop retrying entire HTTP/3 test classes #52258
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve Blazor project template #52234
    area-mvc, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Don't explicitly retry WebConfigAppendsHostingStartup_OutOfProcess #52259
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Fix "Blazor enhanced form handling doesn't honor button formaction attribute" #52220
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.1
  • Use HTTPS URLs for json.schemastore.org #52203
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Update SDK (9.0.100-alpha.1.23568.4) #52224
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • keyboard problem #18939
  • [Windows] Setting IsClippedToBounds="True" inside a Border control will crash on Windows #18937
  • Custom selection styles for items in CollectionView are ignored when programmatically selecting an item #18933
  • Using Nightly builds (8.0.0-nightly) breaks packages that require >= 8.0.3 #18931
  • [Android] Label text not wrapping inside AbsoluteLayout #18930
    Backlog
  • BundleConfig.json not working for language in release mode for .aab files. #18929
  • There isn't the "Additional information" window in my VS 2022 17.8. #18928
  • .NET MAUI Workload installed But the option to choose MAUI doesn't show up on the third dropdown. Tried to install it using "dotnet new install Microsoft.MAUI.Templates", the MAUI option showed up, but now after creation of a MAUI project, it says "Unloaded" #18927
  • .NET MAUI Workload installed But the option to choose MAUI doesn't show up on the third dropdown. #18926
  • Border StrokeShape performance issues #18925
  • Wrong button width when using ImageSource #18924
  • Publish IOS App Error ZipArchive.framework/ZipArchive' contains bitcode. #18920
  • Secure Storage GetAsync returns null in MAUI .NET 7 Android #18914

Closed

  • After installing .NET 8, the MAUI workload does not work in vscode. [macos] [vscode] #18935
  • Flyout title doesn't switch on Detail change #18830
  • [Enhancement] Add IsVisible to MenuItem #18792
  • Regression Android: Border in a Frame results in an empty Frame #18922
  • MAUI Android MainPage assignments break (or crash) the app if it's backgrounded or OnResume #18921
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.3.8149] - modal to modal doesnt call OnNavigatedTo #17978
    .NET 8 SR2
  • CollectionView strange load behavior for WinUI #18913

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow GesturePlatformManager to be created for views with null window… #18938
    community ✨

    area/testing, testing-flakiness

  • [Testing] Add Layout UITests #18923

Merged

  • Fix "Test attachment file path could not be found" #18911

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite how to prevent all the runtime binaries from being emitted? #32382
  • [EF Core 8] Many-to-many relationship with payload #32381
  • Special folders as file location for DB #32380
  • ef core seperate migration project #32378
  • Problem updating an entity in relational database #32377
  • LINQ "Contains" fails to generate SQL with custom converter #32376
  • Did Contains stop working on empty list in EF Core 8? #32375
  • New OpenJSON expression to SQL translation breaks argregates on subquery with 'Cannot perform an aggregate function on an expression containing an aggregate or a subquery' exception #32374
  • EF Core 6 - After Save entity state is reset before event is triggered #32373
  • Improve multi-tenancy support #32371

Closed

  • Convert_regular_column_of_temporal_table_to_sparse failing #32154
    9.0.0
  • EFC8: Lazy Loading regression on newly created objects #32314
    8.0.1
  • Nav expansion visitor does not visit the non-lambda arguments (Skip, Take, ElementAt) #32312
    8.0.2
  • Nav expansion visitor does not visit the Contains item argument #32217
    8.0.2
  • BUG: AccessViolationException using where expression on decimal in .Net 6, x86 target, Sqlite #32180

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32379
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #31448 Use token for NonQueryResultAsync (#31449) #32334
    Servicing-approved
  • Fix to #32154 - Convert_regular_column_of_temporal_table_to_sparse failing #32370
  • [release/8.0] Don't throw when attempting to load from a newly Added entity with unknown FK values #32368
    Servicing-approved
  • Move compiled model tests to EFCore.Specification.Tests #32341
  • Fix typos, doubled words #32372
  • Bump Azure.Identity from 1.10.3 to 1.10.4 #32361
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
